quotes.quote: Exile, for no other motive than ease, would be the last defeat, with no seed of future victory in it.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Victory attained by violence is tantamount to a defeat, for it is momentary.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There are some defeats more triumphant than victories.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: You can take from every experience what it has to offer you. And you cannot be defeated if you just keep taking one breath followed by another.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When defeat is inevitable, it is wisest to yield.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: Be careful that victories do not carry the seed of future defeats.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

quotes.quote: A good man would prefer to be defeated than to defeat injustice by evil means.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
quotes.author: Sun-tzu

quotes.quote: Far better it is to dare mighty things, to win glorious triumphs even though checkered by failure, than to rank with those poor spirits who neither enjoy nor suffer much because they live in the gray twilight that knows neither victory nor defeat.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: What is defeat? Nothing but education; nothing but the first step to something better.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips
